decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (labeled: Cover letter, Purified Air specification, Location Plan, Proposed Ventilation System Documents, Risk Assessment for Odour Control, Design and Access Statement, B9956-AEW-PJ001548-XX-DR-0006, B9956-AEW-PJ001548-XX-DR-0004,B9956-AEW-PJ001548-00-DR-0003, B9956-AEW-PJ001548-XX-DR-0002, B9956-AEW-PJ001548-00-DR-000.
Received: 01/02/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for A5 (Hot Food Takeaway) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times:11:00 to 23:00 Monday to Sunday and on Bank Holidays.
Condition : 4 - No deep fat frying shall take place at the site.

Condition : 5 - There shall be no deliveries of food, equipment or other business materials to the premises and no collection of refuse waste or recyclable materials from the premises except between the hours of 07:00 - 22:00 Monday to Saturday and 10:00 - 18:00 on Sundays and public holidays.

Condition : 6 - The extraction and ventilation equipment shall be installed as specified in the documents hereby approved.  Upon installation of the extraction and ventilation equipment, a report demonstrating that the odour (using appropriate nationally agreed standards as set out in DEFRA Annex B - Guidance on the control of odour and noise from Commercial Kitchen Exhaust system - Jan 05) and noise emitted from the premises does not have a negative effect on neighbouring residents shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The noise emitted from the ventilation system shall have a LAeq 10dB below the background level. The report shall analyse noise measurements taken at the nearest sensitive residential noise receptors in Charlton House and Albany House and shall include recommended remedial measures to achieve the performance level specified by this condition that must be incorporated in the equipment within one month of the approval of the submitted details and shall be so maintained as to meet this standard thereafter

Condition : 7 - Refuse storage arrangements shall be provided within the rear of the site before the use commences.  This shall comprise at least one 1100L Eurobin waste storage bins together with separate facilities for the separation and storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials, which shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  No waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the bins in the designated area. The lids of the Eurobin(s) shall be kept shut at all times other than when waste is being emptied into them or being removed from site.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week or as soon as the storage becomes full, whichever is the earlier.
description: Change of use from a cafe (A3) to a hot food takeaway (A5) with installation of extraction/ventilation equipment and new shopfront and the erection a single storey rear extension
